thread.title: Piers Morgan Calls Out Liberal Brits Trying To Stop Trump From Speaking To Parliament
thread.title_full: Piers Morgan Calls Out Liberal Brits Trying To Stop Trump From Speaking To Parliament

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Piers Morgan Calls Out Liberal Brits Trying To Stop Trump From Speaking To Parliament
text:
09:49pm February 6,   
Piers Morgan isn’t someone who typically comes to mind when you think of the phrase “fair and balanced”. 
In fact, some of the things he said about Trump in the past were completely off the wall and we all remember his epic meltdown when trying to play politics with Ben Shapiro on gun control. 
Having said that, you gotta give credit where credit is due. 
Morgan called out Brits who are trying to ban Trump from speaking at the House of Commons because they “don’t share his values”. 
Piers absolutely nailed it when talking about the situation on British television. 
Here’s his angle… 
“Did China share all our values?” asked Morgan. 
Exactly! 
Piers is absolutely right. 
The hypocrisy is deafening. 
If governments are going to stop talking to other world leaders and not even let them speak because they don’t share the exact same values then that’s going to start us down a slippery slope. 
It’s fine if Britain wants to take that ridiculous step but then they better be consistent about it. LIKE this article?
